The folloging configurations can be used for testings with the 'stream' parameter.

-The stream parameter is used to pass configuratin settings (mandant guid, language, et.c) to the JobFinderApp web application.
-The stream parameter is url and base64 encoded.
-Usage example: localhost:<port>/goodjobs/Home/Index?stream=<steamValue>  

Here some example for debugging:

Language='DE'
GUID='936DA01F-9ABD-4D9D-80C7-02AF85C822A8'
InfoURL= 'http://www.adecco.de/GERMAN/Pages/default.aspx'
stream=AAEAAAD%2f%2f%2f%2f%

Language='EN'
GUID='936DA01F-9ABD-4D9D-80C7-02AF85C822A8'
InfoURL= 'http://www.adecco.com/en-US/Pages/default.aspx'
stream=AAEAAAD%2f%2f%2f%2f%
